text: Arizona's 4th congressional district is a congressional district in the U.S. state of Arizona. Republican Paul Gosar is the representative. == Presidential election results == Year Office Results 2000 President Gore 63 - 35% 2004 President Kerry 62 - 38% 2008 President Obama 66 - 33% 2012 President Romney 67 - 31% 2016 President Trump 68 - 28% 2020 President Trump 68 - 31% == List of representatives == Member Party Years Cong ress Electoral history District location & CountiesMartis, Kenneth C., The Historical Atlas of United States Congressional Districts, 1789-1983. New York: Macmillan Publishing, 1982.Martis, Kenneth C., The Historical Atlas of Political Parties in the United States Congress, 1789-1989.
